headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Leidos Stock Jumps as Outlook Improves for Defense Contractors
summary: The S&P 500 added 0.7% on Wednesday, April 2, 2025, ahead of President Trump's afternoon tariff announcement.

headline: Why Altria Stock Slumped on Wednesday
summary: Altria Group (NYSE: MO) stock was as popular as a used cigarette on Wednesday.  The veteran tobacco company saw its share price wither by nearly 3% on the back of a U.S. Supreme Court ruling that hardly does it any favors.  On Wednesday, the Supreme Court handed down a ruling in a case involving flavored vapes sold by companies like Altria.

headline: Deutsche Bank downgrades Altria on valuation, regulatory risks
summary: Investing.com -- Deutsche Bank downgraded Altria Group (NYSE:MO) Inc to “Hold” from “Buy” citing limited upside following a strong year-to-date rally and ongoing regulatory challenges to its NJOY e-vapor business.

headline: Altria vs. Eli Lilly: What's the Better Stock for Dividend Investors?
summary: Tobacco giant Altria (NYSE: MO) provides a tremendously high dividend yield of 7%, which is well above the S&P 500 index average of 1.3%.  Meanwhile, pharma company Eli Lilly (NYSE: LLY) offers a much lower yield of less than 1%, but its dividend growth rate has been far more impressive.  Which stock is the better buy if your priority is to collect a lot of dividend income?
